name: Gamberetti al curry deliziosi
desc: A simple, common dish in Sumeru. Big shrimps are dipped in a creamy sauce, absorbing its rich flavor. The passionate aroma easily finds its way into your nose. Even a person who claims to have lost their appetite will drool over it.

value.text: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

value.name: Ricetta: gamberetti al curry
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Curry Shrimp.

value.name: Gamberetti
value.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

value.name: Cipolla
value.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

value.name: Spezie
value.desc: Un condimento con vari sapori. A base di frutti di Harra essiccati, sono capaci di arricchire qualsiasi piatto. Gli abitanti di Sumeru affermano che "le spezie si sposano bene con tutto".

value.name: Gamberetti al curry
value.desc: A common household dish in Sumeru. The shrimps are first boiled until chewy, then added into the curry broth. The perfect blend of savory curry and flavors from the ocean is enough to make one's stomach growl. Though it's a common household dish, almost every family seems to have made their own variations to the recipe. Perhaps one could say that for every Sumeru household, there'll be a different version of curry shrimp.

value.name: Gamberetti al curry sospetti
value.desc: A simple, common dish in Sumeru. You can smell curry... though it stings your nose. After looking inside the squishy mess, you finally find a malnourished shrimp. Yes, this is curry shrimp for sure... But should you really give it a try?
